item.name: Updates a customer from the Food Delivery System.

body.raw:
{
    "paymentMethod": "UPI",
    "upiId": "nakulk@okicici",
    "cardNumber": null,
    "address": {
        "addressLine1": "14/374 First floor, DDA Flats",
        "addressLine2": "Madangir, Dr Ambedkar Nagar",
        "city": "New Delhi",
        "state": "Delhi",
        "pinCode": "110062"
    },
    "firstname": "Nakul",
    "lastname": "Kumar",
    "email": "2023mt93202@wilp.bits-pilani.ac.in",
    "username": "nakulk",
    "password": "customer@123",
    "mobile_no": "9911212289"
}

        "name": "Aloo Gobhi ki sabji",

        "price": 365.0,
        "cuisine": "INDIAN",
